entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid came striding towards them, his hair rain-flecked, his bear skin coat flapping behind him, a crossbow in his hand.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog's worse, I bin readin' to him

entities.name: ron
entities.description: How is he? 'Not bad,' said Harry. 'They say he'll be OK.'

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: No more than six visitors at a time! said Madam Pomfrey, hurrying out of her office.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Hagrid makes six,' George pointed out.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout told me abou' Ron!

entities.name: harry
entities.description: How is he? 'Not bad,' said Harry. 'They say he'll be OK.'

relationships.description: Aragog's worse, I bin readin' to him
How is he? 'Not bad,' said Harry. 'They say he'll be OK.'
Hagrid makes six,' George pointed out.
Oh ... yes ...' said Madam Pomfrey, who seemed to have been counting Hagrid as several people due to his vastness.
